text: Carlos José Barisio (3 January 1951 – 5 February 2020) was an Argentine footballer. He played as a goalkeeper. He retired from football in 1987, after playing 271 games in the Argentinian Primera. He played as a Ferro Carril Oeste player in 1981. He set the Primera record for the longest period without letting in a goal.rsssf: Ferro Carril Oeste Barisio died on 5 February 2020 of lung cancer, aged 69.Murió Carlos Barisio, el arquero récord del fútbol argentino ==References== Category:Argentine footballers Category:2020 deaths Category:1951 births Category:Deaths from lung cancer
title: Carlos Barisio
